sql_injection.description: Ensure that system credential storage facilities are used to store sensitive data, and input validation is applied to prevent Injection attacks.

webview_xss.description: Ensure that WebViews are configured to limit access to sensitive data and features. JavaScript execution should be disabled unless explicitly required.

insecure_webview.description: Ensure that WebViews do not expose critical interfaces or allow untrusted content to access internal resources.

hardcoded_secrets.description: Ensure that no sensitive data, such as API keys or passwords, is hardcoded in the source code.

insecure_storage.description: Ensure that sensitive data is stored securely using the Android Keystore system or EncryptedSharedPreferences.

insecure_file_permissions.description: Ensure that the app uses appropriate file permissions (e.g., Context.MODE_PRIVATE) to prevent unauthorized access by other apps.

insecure_random_number_generation.description: Ensure that the app uses strong, cryptographically secure random number generators (SecureRandom) instead of weak ones (Random).

biometric_bypass.description: Ensure that biometric authentication is implemented securely and cannot be easily bypassed.

intent_spoofing.description: Ensure that exported components are protected with permissions or intents are validated to prevent spoofing attacks.

exported_components.description: Ensure that components (Activities, Services, Receivers) are not exported unless necessary, and are protected by permissions.

webview_deeplink.description: Ensure that deep links are properly validated to prevent URL manipulation or execution of arbitrary actions via WebViews.

deeplink_hijack.description: Ensure that the app verifies the origin and integrity of data received via deep links.

path_traversal.description: Ensure that file inputs are validated to prevent Path Traversal attacks giving access to arbitrary files.

jetpack_compose_security.description: Ensure that UI components handle sensitive data securely and do not leak information via side channels.

graphql_injection.description: Ensure that API inputs are validated to prevent injection attacks against backend services.
